• Ruby Techniques Screencasts – Some basic things you might want to learn/refresh.
  • Activity plugin for rails – A simple way to grab recent activity on a given model.
  • “CSS > Tables”:http://www.chromaticsites.com/blog/13-reasons-why-css-is-superior-to-tables-in-website-design/ – no doubt.
  • JQuery form beautifiers – Form designs are my curse.
  • Online collaboration tools – Google docs win, as far as i can tell.
